column3: My parents told me I would become a doctor and then in my spare time I would become a concert pianist. So, both my day job and my spare time were sort of taken care of.

Nothing puzzles me more than the time and space; and yet nothing troubles me less.
Each moment is perfect and heaven-sent, in that each moment holds the seeds for growth.
